Theatre and Me

Date Created: 5 Jul 2024

My theatre knowledge usually intertwines with my fascination with games and systems. I have played a lot of table-top roleplaying games, I write text adventures, and improv is fundamental to how I work creatively. I'm just always interested in sites where characters and limitations create stories.

  • Breaking The Fourth Wall In Improv - Originally written 2018.
  • Online Improv, The Offers Economy, and Lessons From D&D - Originally written in 2020, during the rise of online theatre.
  • Impromptunes! - Written in 2021, an interactive experience that teaches improvisational piano.
  • Some Other Mirror, At Edinburgh Fringe 2022 - My experience performing my solo show in 2022.
